mapper.update: update one_user set active='active' , grade = 'ROLE_USER' where username = #{username} and password = #{password}
mapper.select: select count(*) from one_user where username=#{username}
mapper.insert: insert into one_user (username, password, nickname, grade, favorite, active) values(#{username},#{password},#{nickname},'ROLE_NON',#{favorite},#{active})
insert into one_user (username, password, nickname, grade, favorite, active, kCheck) values(#{username},#{password},#{nickname},'ROLE_USER',#{favorite},#{active},#{kCheck})
insert into one_user (username, password, nickname, grade, favorite, active) values(#{username},#{password},#{nickname},'ROLE_ADMIN',#{favorite},#{active})
insert into one_user (username, password, nickname, grade, favorite, active) values(#{username},#{password},#{nickname},'ROLE_MEMBER',#{favorite},#{active})
